ovdesc.p: This file is updated during creation of DD.ITEM and contains the list of DD.ITEM & D.DDI that are scheduled for a value date for each DD.PARAMETER. This is deleted once the claim file is generated for the value date & same is updated in DD.HEADER.
All updates to this file are effected automatically by the system and the only functions users are allowed to perform are (L)IST, (S)EE and (P)RINT.

desc.p: This contains the id of the DD.PROCESS.LIST record.
The format is DD.PARAMETER Id "-" value date "-" Mandate "-" Currency of DD.ITEMs stored in the file.
This field stores the sum amount of items processed during the file generation phase. The field will be cleared once the file is actually generated.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This contains the reference number of the DD.ITEM created for the DD.PARAMETER & value date as per the ID of this application.
This field stores the number of items processed during the file generation phase. The field will be cleared once the file is actually generated.
This field stores the details of items processed during the file generation phase. The field will be cleared once the file is actually generated.
